arn.description: ARN of the Lambda Layer with version.

code.description: Path to the function's deployment package within the local filesystem. If defined, The `s3_`-prefixed options cannot be used.

compatibleArchitectures.description: List of [Architectures](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/API_PublishLayerVersion.html#SSS-PublishLayerVersion-request-CompatibleArchitectures) this layer is compatible with. Currently `x86_64` and `arm64` can be specified.

compatibleRuntimes.description: List of [Runtimes](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/API_PublishLayerVersion.html#SSS-PublishLayerVersion-request-CompatibleRuntimes) this layer is compatible with. Up to 15 runtimes can be specified.

description.description: Description of what your Lambda Layer does.

layerArn.description: ARN of the Lambda Layer without version.

layerName.description:
Unique name for your Lambda Layer

The following arguments are optional:

licenseInfo.description: License info for your Lambda Layer. See [License Info](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/API_PublishLayerVersion.html#SSS-PublishLayerVersion-request-LicenseInfo).

s3Bucket.description: S3 bucket location containing the function's deployment package. Conflicts with `filename`. This bucket must reside in the same AWS region where you are creating the Lambda function.

s3Key.description: S3 key of an object containing the function's deployment package. Conflicts with `filename`.

s3ObjectVersion.description: Object version containing the function's deployment package. Conflicts with `filename`.

signingProfileVersionArn.description: ARN for a signing profile version.

skipDestroy.description: Whether to retain the old version of a previously deployed Lambda Layer. Default is `false`. When this is not set to `true`, changing any of `compatible_architectures`, `compatible_runtimes`, `description`, `filename`, `layer_name`, `license_info`, `s3_bucket`, `s3_key`, `s3_object_version`, or `source_code_hash` forces deletion of the existing layer version and creation of a new layer version.

sourceCodeHash.description: Used to trigger updates. Must be set to a base64-encoded SHA256 hash of the package file specified with either `filename` or `s3_key`.

sourceCodeSize.description: Size in bytes of the function .zip file.

code.description: Path to the function's deployment package within the local filesystem. If defined, The `s3_`-prefixed options cannot be used.

compatibleArchitectures.description: List of [Architectures](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/API_PublishLayerVersion.html#SSS-PublishLayerVersion-request-CompatibleArchitectures) this layer is compatible with. Currently `x86_64` and `arm64` can be specified.

compatibleRuntimes.description: List of [Runtimes](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/API_PublishLayerVersion.html#SSS-PublishLayerVersion-request-CompatibleRuntimes) this layer is compatible with. Up to 15 runtimes can be specified.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering LayerVersion resources.
